<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.GlobalUtils</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Global Scope Adapter Utility</description>
        <name>GlobalUtils</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var GlobalUtils = Class.create();
GlobalUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function () { },

    /** Update a GlideRecord via Global Application scope
     * 
     * @param tableName - target table name to use for GlideRecord
     * @param grSid - target sys_id to get for update
     * @param grFieldObj - JSON array of objects: [ { name: "fieldName", value: "targetValue"}]
     * @param triggerWorkflow - Set to true of false prior to update: gr.setWorkflow(triggerWorkflow);
     */
    updateGlobalRecord: function (tableName, grSid, grFieldObj, triggerWorkflow) {
        var gr = new GlideRecord(tableName);
        if (gr.get(grSid)) {
            for (var f in grFieldObj) {
                gr[grFieldObj[f].name] = grFieldObj[f].value;
            }
        }
        if (!gs.nil(triggerWorkflow) && !triggerWorkflow) {
            gr.setWorkflow(triggerWorkflow);
        }
        gr.update();
        gr.setWorkflow(true); // Revert workflow state on the GlideRecord
    },
    /** Insert a GlideRecord via Global Application scope
     * 
     * @param tableName - target table name to use for GlideRecord
     * @param grFieldObj - JSON array of objects: [ { name: "fieldName", value: "targetValue"}]
     * @param triggerWorkflow - Set to true of false prior to update: gr.setWorkflow(triggerWorkflow);
     */
    insertGlobalRecord: function (tableName, grFieldObj, triggerWorkflow) {
        var gr = new GlideRecord(tableName);
        for (var f in grFieldObj) {
            gr[grFieldObj[f].name] = grFieldObj[f].value;
        }
        if (!gs.nil(triggerWorkflow) && !triggerWorkflow) {
            gr.setWorkflow(triggerWorkflow);
        }
        return gr.insert();
    },

    type: 'GlobalUtils'
};]]></script>
